Amour Ivory

$165

Introducing the Amour bandeau in Ivory! The two-tone composition with our signature hand-pleated mesh adds a touch of architectural modernity to a timeless and chic silhouette. Our double self-lining and clean finish makes for comfort, mobility and the perfect fit. *The model is 5'8" and is wearing a size XS

Amour Rouge

$165

Our Amour two-piece is the perfect bandeau with boning for extra support, a detachable halter, and our signature two tone hand-pleated mesh. Double self-lining and clean finish seams makes for comfort, mobility and a perfect fit. *The model is 5'8" and wearing a size XS.

Ballet Beige

$400

The Ballet maillot offers a Parisian sentiment, with its Peter-Pan collar and French cufflinks. The power mesh sleeves protect from UV rays and help to create our take on the full-coverage ‘body suit’. The invisible zipper in the back allows for easy dressing and our keyhole detail is the added touch we love!

Ballet Maillot Black

$400

The Ballet maillot is our ode to “Le Sentiment Parisien”. The all black edition with Ivory accents is our favorite combination yet, allowing the chic Peter-Pan collar and French cufflinks to stand out in this perfectly monochromatic medley. The power mesh sleeves protect from UV rays and help create our take on the full-coverage ‘body suit’.

Bardot Maillot Navy

$380

French corsetry and vintage silhouettes inspire our Bardot strapless maillot. Our signature pleating is carefully draped around the top half and underwire and boning are incorporated to maintain shape and support. The rich Navy color gives a highlighted sophistication to this vintage one-piece.

Colette Maillot Gold

$320

For a day-to-evening body suit, we created the Colette maillot. With a collar that can be popped up or laid flat, this signature suit embodies a poolside aesthetic that can easily transition into evening. Pair it with a chic, high-waist pant and our sleek deep V silhouette adds a touch of sensuality to an already sophisticated outfit.

Dali Bralette Black

$130

The Dalì bralette is the epitome of a classic bikini. In honor of our effortlessly chic icon, Jane Birkin, this two-piece embraces the French aesthetic of less-is-more. The top band provides plenty of comfort and support, while the triangle doesn’t overwhelm with too much fabric. It’s pretty much perfect. Just like Jane.

Dali Bralette Navy

$130

The Dalì bralette is the epitome of a classic bikini. In honor of our effortlessly chic philosophy, this two-piece bralette embraces the French aesthetic of “less-is-more.” The new Navy edition is the perfect combination of playful and timeless. The top band provides plenty of comfort and support, while the triangle doesn’t overwhelm with too much fabric.
